TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FixedPlattCalibratorEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Calibrators.CalibratorEstimatorBase`1<class Microsoft.ML.Calibrators.PlattCalibrator>
Public NotInheritable Class FixedPlattCalibratorEstimator Inherits CalibratorEstimatorBase(Of PlattCalibrator)

Docs.summary: Obtains the probability values by applying the sigmoid: f(x) = 1 / (1 + exp(-slope * x + offset). Note that unlike, say, , the fit function here is trivial and just "fits" a calibrator with the provided parameters.
Docs.remarks: For the usage pattern see the example in .

MemberSignature.Value: public FixedPlattCalibratorEstimator (Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, double slope = 1, double offset = 0, string scoreColumn = "Score");
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, float64 slope, float64 offset, string scoreColumn) cil managed
Public Sub New (env As IHostEnvironment, Optional slope As Double = 1, Optional offset As Double = 0, Optional scoreColumn As String = "Score")

Docs.param: The slope in the function of the exponent of the sigmoid.
The offset in the function of the exponent of the sigmoid.
The score column name. This is consumed both when this estimator is fit and when the estimator is consumed.
Docs.remarks: Note that unlike many other calibrator estimators this one has the parameters pre-specified. This means that it does not have a label or weight column specified as an input during training.
